name: Tank 51
description: Tank 51 is an increasingly difficult retro styled fast pace shooter. Aliens have invaded planet earth and it is up to you the player to stop the alien invasion..in your tank.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia gtx 220 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2.60GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: nvidia gtx 220 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
